overview:
He is the CTO of Najmtek and the inventor of the UBook. With an Industrial and mechanical design degree and MCSE training he has been able to offer innovative ideas to develop commercial applications.

He worked for the internationally well known enterprises such as Airbus, MBK, Vachette, Alain Prost F1, inventing each time an item or a design to satisfy and fulfill the needs of the company.

After acquiring uncountable experiences on its diversity and hundreds of innovative inventions (from a manufacturing machine to an airplane reverser built with scooter parts), he joined the international inventorsâ€™ club. Surprising the public with his inventions, he received a silver medal in Brussels at a show for his creation of a drilling portable machine for sheet metal in 1993. In 2008, he received a gold medal for the touchboard computer UBook at the 36th International Exhibition of Invention of Geneva.

Managing the transition from an innovative idea, his scientific and technological creativity to a revolutionary product on the market is what he has done throughout his career. He is ready to carry his brand and product to an infinitely successful future.

degrees.degree_type: Industrial Designer and Conceptor master degree
degrees.subject: Mecanics, Industrial design and concept
